title: arithmetic-formula
description: math arithmetic formula from basic to advanched
author: Phoenix Admission Care

dataSet.title: probability
dataSet:
\text{**The probability of rolling any number on a weighted 6-sided die, with faces numbered 1 through 6, is directly proportional to the number rolled. What is the probability of getting 5, if the die rolled only once?
Ans:** Probability = $\frac{individual~probability}{total~probability}$ = $\frac{5}{1+2+3+4+5+6}$ = $\frac{5}{21}}
